Description: On US-50 East in the County of Loudoun, in the vicinity of St Louis Rd; Rt. 611N/S (Loudoun County), motorists can expect delays due to weather. Lane closures exist.

Description: On I-64 at mile marker 286.8 in the City of Virginia Beach, near Indian River Road, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The west right shoulder is closed.
